templates_created.description: Process URL content into a digest
Process PDF content into a digest
Complex workflow example with conditional steps

example_yaml_snippet.content:
workflow:
  name: "url_to_digest"
  description: "Process a URL and generate a digest"

tasks:
  - name: "ingest_url"
    agent: "ingestion"
    type: "url"
    parameters:
      url: "{{ input.url }}"
    output: "ingested_content"

testing_commands:
# Run URL to Digest workflow
python runner/cli_runner.py run_workflow workflows/templates/url_to_digest.yaml --input.url "https://example.com"

# Run PDF to Digest workflow
python runner/cli_runner.py run_workflow workflows/templates/pdf_to_digest.yaml --input.file_path "/path/to/document.pdf"
notes: Created a comprehensive set of workflow templates and documentation to standardize workflow creation across the project. The templates demonstrate best practices for structuring workflows, handling inputs/outputs, and implementing common patterns like conditional execution and error handling.
